answers.a: The viscosity is defined as the shear stress required to produce unit rate of shear strain
answers.b: The viscosity is defined as the shear stress required to produce 100 unit rate of shear strain
answers.c: The viscosity is defined as the shear stress required to produce 10 unit rate of shear strain
answers.d: The viscosity is defined as the shear stress required to produce 0.1 unit rate of shear strain.
